response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I understand its worth to you stands at $12,000. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it from me at a price of $10,000. This opportunity allows you to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive price, maximizing your investment while benefiting from its unparalleled capabilities. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 10000}
